job description:
Are you passionate about data? Do you like delivering impactful analysis and driving strategic results? As a Quantitative Analytics Consultant you will assume responsibility for developing and delivering innovative approaches to data and analysis for various global initiatives with a particular focus on:

  • Producing high-end, quantitative analysis and predictive modeling
  • Designing cutting-edge data visualizations and dashboards
  • Providing expertise across an advanced suite of analytical tools


In this role you will have an opportunity to partner with senior stakeholders across the organization, serving as a subject matter expert relative to complex business analysis and quantitative analysis.

You Will:

  • Lead the execution, development, and communication of high-end analysis and predictive models from concept through to design and completion
  • Design compelling data visualizations to communicate complex ideas to business leaders and generate insights that drive business value
  • Prepare cost/benefit analysis and recommend solutions based on rigorous quantitative analysis

Desired Qualifications:

  • You should have an advanced degree (Master’s or PhD) in statistics, economics or another quantitative discipline
  • You should have advanced knowledge of multiple mathematical programming languages such as R, MATLAB and Python
  • You should be passionate about advanced analytics, and have demonstrated experience delivering impactful analysis to drive strategic results
  • You should have strong analytical and strategic thinking skills, and have demonstrated an ability to communicate complex ideas through pointed analysis and data visualization
  • You should have exposure to data visualization tools such as Qlikview, Tableau or Spotfire
  • You should have exposure to Big Data initiatives such as Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Cloudera, Sqoop, and/or Spark
  • If you have experience in investment banking, private equity, or corporate finance it is a plus
